# [Interview #897: Twitter 2013 (Non-WoT), Entry #16](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=897#16)

#### [Vanessa (23 January 2013)](http://twitter.com/wilde4fitness/status/294188125708771328)

Are the Ghostbloods associated with Odium?

#### [Brandon Sanderson (23 January 2013)](http://twitter.com/BrandSanderson/status/294190258680115201)

Odium has his fingers in a LOT of things.
